rukus.text: 34|22|Ni shuo:“Nimen she an la er ren zuo shenling de, nimen qidao tamen ba, tamen buneng guanli tiandi jian wei chen zhi zhong de shiwu, tamen sihao buneng canyu tiandi de zaohua. An la bu yi tamen zhong de renhe yige wei zhushou.”

34|23|Chu an la suo xuke zhe wai, zai an la nali, shuo qing jiang wu biyi. Zhidao tamen xinzhong de kongju bei paichu de shihou, tamen cai shuo:“Nimen de zhu shuole shenme?” Tamen shuo:“Zhenli.” Ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi da de.
34|24|Ni shuo:“Shei cong tianshang he dixia gongji nimen?” Ni shuo:“An la. Women huo nimen, shi zai zhengdao shang de, huo shi zai xianzhu de mi wu zhong de.”
34|25|Ni shuo:“Duiyu women suo fan de zui, nimen bu shoushen wen; duiyu nimen suo zuo de shi, women ye bu shoushen wen.”
34|26|Ni shuo:“Women de zhu, jiang zhaoji women, ranhou, yi zhenli er wei women caipan, ta que shi zui shanyu caipan de, que shi quanzhi de.”
34|27|Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo, nimen suo cheng wei ta de huoban de.” Jue buneng. Buran, ta shi an la, shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de.
34|28|Wo zhi paiqian ni wei quan renlei de baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe, dan shiren daban bu zhidao.
34|29|Tamen shuo:“Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de, zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne?”
34|30|Ni shuo:“Nimen de yue qi shi you shi ri de, nimen bude shaoshao chidao, ye bude shaoshao zao dao.”
